title: Kittiwakes: RSPB in netting call over 'heartbreaking' video
content: This video can not be playedThe RSPB has called for netting on buildings to be taken down because it is stopping endangered birds from nesting.Video posted on Twitter showed a kittiwake trying but failing to reach ledges in Lowestoft, Suffolk. A dead bird was later found trapped there.In the tweet, <https://twitter.com/rspbengland/status/1389618280554504192> the RSPB said: "Heartbreaking to see kittiwakes find their home nesting sites blocked by nets."Two of the building's occupants have pledged to take action.
